item.title: 3 way traffic lights - no works listed, 1st December
item.description:
387478, 216245 Junction Lobleys Drive and Yew Tree Road 3 way traffic light control. Currently showing up to 30 minutes delay, if coming from Abbeymead Avenue. I passed these lights setup ready to be put into place on Sunday evening assuming they would be put into place after 9:30 am

item.title: Hedgerows, 30th November
item.description:
Steel inspection/drain cover located in the highway adjacent to Property ‘Hedgerows’ rattles/bangs as traffic drives over. I have a drain in lower floor of my Property ’Windermere’ on the opposite side of the road. when traffic travel over the said chamber cover I get a noise/knocking sound in our property. I can hear this throughout the ground floor and is now causing a nuisance. My tel 07788567901. Many thanks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Reddings, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole getting larger, tarmac cracking around it, 30th November
item.description:
To the right hand side of Highbury cottage, pothole situated on road making the access to a small carpark quite dangerous now.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 87, High Street, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
